name: SCP022
description: This is a short physics game about escaping from a closed chamber.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64-bit Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-7200U CPU @ 2.50Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 940MX DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 64-bit Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-6700 CPU @ 3.40Ghz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space
